import uvicorn
from src.main import app

")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "/sp.specify

Update the existing authenticated dashboard of my Todo application.
upgrade Dashbord
Context:
- Authentication \(sign up / sign in\) is already implemented
- User is already logged in when accessing dashboard
- Backend APIs for task CRUD already exist
- Backnd is alredy conected to Fronend
- This task is ONLY about upgrading the dashboard UI + interactions

Dashboard Requirements:

1. Task Management
- User can add a new task
- User can update an existing task
- User can delete a task
- User can mark a task as completed
- User can view all tasks
- User can filter tasks:
  - All tasks
  - Pending tasks
  - Completed tasks
- User can search tasks by title or description

2. Task States
- Pending tasks should be visually distinct
- Completed tasks should appear muted or crossed
- Task completion should update instantly without page reload

3. Voice Command
- User can add tasks using voice command
- Voice command should support:
  - ""Add task buy groceries""
  - ""Complete task buy groceries""
- If voice is unsupported, show graceful fallback

4. User Profile Section
- Show logged-in user name
- Show user profile/avatar placeholder
- Logout button must be clearly visible
- Logout should clear session and redirect to login page

5. Dashboard Layout
- Hero section at top of dashboard
- Hero should include:
  - Welcome message with user name
  - Short motivational text
- Dashboard cards for:
  - Total tasks
  - Completed tasks
  - Pending tasks

6. UI & Animation
- Use Framer Motion for animations
- Smooth transitions when:
  - Adding task Button
  - Deleting task Button
  - Completing task Button
  - Switching filters 
- Modern, clean, professional UI
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile

7. Constraints
- Do NOT change authentication logic
- Do NOT change backend APIs unless required
- Focus on dashboard UI, UX, and frontend logic only

Deliverables:
- Clear dashboard specification
- User stories for each dashboard feature
- Acceptance criteria for:
  - Task CRUD
  - Search & filter
  - Voice command
  - Profile with user name and logout button
- UI behavior description" -Json -Number 1 -ShortName "dashboard-ui-upgrade" "Update the existing authenticated dashboard of my Todo application.")
